content: Packing for NYC feels like leaving a story unfinished. Japan taught me connection; now to see how these lessons play out back home. Excited yet uncertain—NYC, here I come! 🗾✈️🗽
raw_content: As I pack my bags for NYC, leaving Japan feels like closing a cherished book mid-story. The pages here taught me the art of connection, and now I'm curious to see how these lessons unfold back home. Excited yet uncertain, like opening a blank canvas in a bustling city. 🗾✈️🗽
